name: places/ChIJSS3zc_L5wokRZGHiN9u2CLA
adrFormatAddress: 1115 Broadway, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
The event ran smoothly and was perfect! People REALLY loved the oat balls in particular from the afternoon snack and I didn’t get one complaint on the food!  Everyone loved everything and told us how wonderful our choices were.  Can’t thank you enough for being so amazing and having everything on point!  Especially when I said to start dessert early but still pass apps for half the staff.. That worked out so well!!

Rest assured..if we do 2024 meeting in NYC again…you will be the caterer!

originalText.text: My company recently held a series of events (two lunches, two evening cocktail events) with Personal Touch Experience to unveil our new showroom space in NYC. Building up to the event, the Personal Touch team was totally and completely accommodating. They simply could not have been more professional to deal with regarding all aspects of our event. They dove in to the project with unbounded enthusiasm and brought some really great ideas to the table. Working with my event management firm, they designed a menu which was wholly befitting of our audience (designers, architects, etc.). Taking our event flow into mind, they actually conceived of different stations which expertly extended to space and ensured that traffic steadily flowed to all parts of the showroom as opposed to having folks congregating around one or two stations. When it came to the day of the events, the Personal Touch team was passionate and laser-focused on ensuring our event attendees had amazing food and top-notch service as they toured and enjoyed the space. The Personal Touch team was outstandingly professional and accommodating at every turn. Example 1: One of our guests requested a specific brand of liquor and a member of team went out and got it especially for them. Example 2: A coworker asked if one of the items being butlered was available: that and more was promptly brought to where they were standing just a few short moments later. The amazing presentation, quality of personalized service and all-around wonderful food was all that we could have asked for and more. Based off of this experience, we don’t plan on calling anyone else for our catering needs for an event such as this – and you shouldn’t either.

originalText.text: I engaged Personal Touch Catering for a graduation party.  The entire team did a fabulous job, and the food and display was amazing as well. Brittney was our captain and she paid attention to every detail.  Manny was the executive chef and was amazing.  Diego the bartender was creative and attentive.  All the wait staff and cooking staff were fabulous too. Just an amazing party.

originalText.text: This is the second year in a row that we've used Personal Touch Catering and we are so impressed with the team! Not only does the staff work with you leading up to the event to currate a menu based on your vision, but the onsite staff make you feel like an guest at your own party! We'll continue to use them for years to come!

originalText.text: John was amazing! Personal Touch Catering goes above and beyond to deliver the best experience. Like the name says the events have a “personal touch”.
